description: The trap will be generated if the total number of registrations
on all secondary SIP interfaces exceed threshold.
The total number of registrations on all secondary SIP interfaces.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipSecInterfaceTotalRegistrations

description: The max threshold for registrations on all secondary SIP interfaces
beyond which trap and alarm will be raised.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipSecInterfaceRegThreshold

description: The trap will be generated if the total number of registrations
on all secondary SIP interfaces go below clear threshold.

event.Summary: Secondary SIP registrations $v1 back below threshold $v2

description: The total number of registrations on all secondary SIP interfaces.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipSecInterfaceTotalRegistrations

description: The threshold for registrations on all secondary SIP interfaces
below which if alarm was raised before, it will be cleared.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipSecInterfaceClearThreshold

description: The trap will be generated when SIP interface enters Survivability Mode.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APSIP-MIB::apSipSurvivabilityModeEnter APSYSMGMT-MIB::apSysMgmtSipInterfaceRealmName s EXAMPLE APSYSMGMT-MIB::apSysMgmtSipInterfaceIP s EXAMPLE

description: The realm of the Sip Interface that is changing status
variables.name: APSYSMGMT-MIB::apSysMgmtSipInterfaceRealmName

description: The ip address of the Sip Interface that is changing status
variables.name: APSYSMGMT-MIB::apSysMgmtSipInterfaceIP

description: The trap will be generated when SIP interface exits Survivability Mode and
resumes normal operation.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APSIP-MIB::apSipSurvivabilityModeExit APSYSMGMT-MIB::apSysMgmtSipInterfaceRealmName s EXAMPLE APSYSMGMT-MIB::apSysMgmtSipInterfaceIP s EXAMPLE

description: The realm of the Sip Interface that is changing status
variables.name: APSYSMGMT-MIB::apSysMgmtSipInterfaceRealmName

description: The ip address of the Sip Interface that is changing status
variables.name: APSYSMGMT-MIB::apSysMgmtSipInterfaceIP

description: The trap will be generated if the item indicated by
apSipCACUtilTrapType with value indicated by
apSipCACUtilTrapValue exceeds the monitoring threshold.
The object ID of the item whose value exceeds its monitoring
threshold. It could be the OID of instances of
apSipSaCacSessionUtilLevel
apSipSaCacBurstRateUtilLevel
apSipInterfaceCacSessionUtilLevel
apSipInterfaceCacBurstRateUtilLevel
apSigRealmCacSessionUtilLevel, or
apSigRealmCacBurstRateUtilLevel.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipCACUtilTrapType

description: The value of the object which causes the trap to occur.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipCACUtilTrapValue

description: The trap will be generated if the item indicated by
apSipCACUtilTrapType with value indicated by
apSipCACUtilTrapValue is below the monitoring threshold.
The object ID of the item whose value exceeds its monitoring
threshold. It could be the OID of instances of
apSipSaCacSessionUtilLevel
apSipSaCacBurstRateUtilLevel
apSipInterfaceCacSessionUtilLevel
apSipInterfaceCacBurstRateUtilLevel
apSigRealmCacSessionUtilLevel, or
apSigRealmCacBurstRateUtilLevel.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipCACUtilTrapType

description: The value of the object which causes the trap to occur.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipCACUtilTrapValue

description: This trap will be generated when a Recording Dialog fails to send a timely
response to a requests, typically an in-dialog OPTIONS request.

event.Summary: Recording dialog timed out on in-dialog request

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APSIP-MIB::apSipRecRecDlgFailNotify APSIP-MIB::apSipRecRecDlgCallIdHeader s EXAMPLE APSIP-MIB::apSipRecRecDlgToHeader s EXAMPLE APSIP-MIB::apSipRecRecDlgFromHeader s EXAMPLE

description: Call-ID header value for Recording Dialog
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipRecRecDlgCallIdHeader

description: To header value for Recording Dialog
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipRecRecDlgToHeader

description: From header value for Recording Dialog
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipRecRecDlgFromHeader

description: This trap will be generated when a Communications Session is terminated
because a recording dialog could not be established or prematurely terminated.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APSIP-MIB::apSipRecCommSessionNotify APSIP-MIB::apSipRecCommSessCallIdHeader s EXAMPLE APSIP-MIB::apSipRecCommSessToHeader s EXAMPLE APSIP-MIB::apSipRecCommSessFromHeader s EXAMPLE

description: Call-ID header value for Communications Session Server Dialog
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipRecCommSessCallIdHeader

description: To header value for Communications Session Server Dialog
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipRecCommSessToHeader

description: From header value for Communications Session Server Dialog
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipRecCommSessFromHeader

description: This trap will be generated when the percentage of 503 Service Unavailable
response exceeds the configured threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APSIP-MIB::apSip503RespThresholdCrossedNotify APSIP-MIB::apSip503ConfiguredThreshold i 9999 APSIP-MIB::apSip503RespRate i 9999 APSIP-MIB::apSip503MethodName s EXAMPLE

description: Threshold (in percentage) to monitor SIP 503 Service Unavailable Response
generated by SBC
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSip503ConfiguredThreshold

description: Current rate when SIP 503 Response exceeds the configured threshold
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSip503RespRate

description: SIP Request for which 503 response threshold has exceeded
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSip503MethodName

description: This trap will be generated when the Steering pool utilization for realm
exceeds the configured threshold

event.Summary: Steering pool utilization ($v3) for realm $v1 exceeded threshold $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APSIP-MIB::apSipSteeringPoolThresholdCrossedNotify APSIP-MIB::apSipRealm s EXAMPLE APSIP-MIB::apSipSteeringPoolThreshold i 9999 APSIP-MIB::apSipSteeringPoolUtilization i 9999

description: Realm for which the steering pool usage crossed the configured threshold
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipRealm

description: Configured threshold of steering pool for the realm
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipSteeringPoolThreshold

description: Current utilization when the configured threshold is crossed
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apSipSteeringPoolUtilization

description: The trap will be generated when an enabled config backup push receiver fails.

event.Summary: Config backup push receiver failed due to $v3

description: The address type of the receiver.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apAppsConfigPushReceiverAddressType

description: The address of the push receiver.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apAppsConfigPushReceiverAddress

description: The reason code for the failure.
variables.name: APSIP-MIB::apAppsConfigPushReceiverFailureReasonCode
